TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Ride, title = Ride, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ride} }

S.FORM: Ride Itiniay i Manzhou Cen no Pingtung ko Ride a niyaro', 167 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 420 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 36% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 153 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 64% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 267 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan35%, Amis1%.

Ride Itiniay i Manzhoo Cen no Pingtong ko Ride a niyaro', 167 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 420 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 36% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 153 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 64% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 267 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan35%, Amis1%.
